title: bug for LeaverBuster
body: last rank , when i finished game , the  LeaverBuster  told me i am punished for 5 game that w8 20 min evey game. i reconect one time, that no reson that i am pushished

replies.body: Even if you return to the game, you're still gone for a period of time which causes an negative experience for others.  It's really important to resolve whatever is causing you to disconnect to prevent [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Let me know if I can help with that!
